overview: Dave Nugent started his career as a software developer at IBM in New York. During his 23 years with IBM he held sales and marketing positions in NY Banking and the Northeastern Area Systems Center, transferred to IBM San Jose in 1993 to work in storage systems National Technical Support, and eventually moved back to software as a Development Manager and then a Product Manager. In 2000, he was hired into Xilinx by Babak Hedayati, and has been working for him in various marketing and operations capacities since then at Xilinx, Cypress and DeHood.
